careerBackground: After my graduation in Computer Science in Portugal, I started my career as a Full-Stack Java Developer. I worked within Application Support, where I learnt the importance of the logs and performance testing to achieve more quality in the basecode.After my Postgraduate in Computer Science - Multimedia, I moved to London to work as a Frontend Developer, working on the desktop, smartphone and tablet web experience using cutting edge technologies.
superHeroPower: Telepathy would give me insight into user requirements without the need for so many questions!
